name: admintools-cal.png
copy: A dashboard for administrators of multiple campaigns, designed to allow large amounts of data to be fetched as easily and quickly as possible.

name: admintools-fetch
copy: Multiple organizations can be specified via the Organization and ID # searches.

copy: All results are summed up, with values displayed in the Totals table.

name: admintools-search.png
copy: Users can search through multiple criteria, including a free text search of campaign names.
